title: Jesus Christ Quiz - Easy Level
description: Perfect for beginners! Test your basic knowledge of Jesus Christ in the Bible.

questions.question: In which Gospel is the account of Jesus' Sermon on the Mount primarily found?
questions.explanation: The Sermon on the Mount is mainly recorded in Matthew chapters 5 to 7.

questions.question: Who baptized Jesus according to the Bible?
questions.explanation: Jesus was baptized by John the Baptist as described in the Gospels.

questions.question: Which miracle did Jesus perform at the wedding in Cana?
questions.explanation: Jesus' first recorded miracle was turning water into wine at Cana.

questions.question: What parable did Jesus use to teach about forgiveness and mercy?
options: The Parable of the Prodigal Son
The Parable of the Good Samaritan
questions.correctAnswer: The Parable of the Prodigal Son
questions.explanation: The Parable of the Prodigal Son illustrates forgiveness and mercy.

questions.question: Where did Jesus pray before His arrest?
questions.explanation: Jesus prayed in the Garden of Gethsemane before His arrest.

questions.question: Who denied Jesus three times before the rooster crowed?
questions.explanation: Peter denied Jesus three times as Jesus predicted.

questions.question: True or False: Jesus was crucified during the Jewish festival of Passover.
questions.explanation: Jesus was crucified during Passover, as recorded in the Gospels.

questions.question: Who witnessed the Transfiguration of Jesus alongside Peter and John?
questions.explanation: Peter, James, and John witnessed the Transfiguration.

questions.question: Which disciple walked on water toward Jesus but began to sink?
questions.explanation: Peter walked on water toward Jesus but sank when afraid.

questions.question: What is the key message of Jesus' teachings on the Kingdom of God?
questions.explanation: Jesus taught that entering the Kingdom of God requires repentance and faith.

questions.question: True or False: Jesus called Matthew, a tax collector, to be one of His disciples.
questions.explanation: Jesus called Matthew, the tax collector, to follow Him.

questions.question: During the Last Supper, what did Jesus use to symbolize His body?
questions.explanation: Jesus broke bread to symbolize His body given for believers.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: Jesus said, "I am the _____ of life."
questions.explanation: Jesus said, 'I am the light of life' indicating He brings spiritual illumination.

questions.question: True or False: Jesus ascended to heaven in the presence of His disciples.
questions.explanation: Jesus ascended to heaven before His disciples' eyes.

questions.question: What is one of the signs Jesus gave about His Second Coming?
questions.explanation: Jesus said the sun will be darkened as a sign of His return.
